ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This course is required so my recommendation to fellow students is irrelevant. I would summarize it as a necessary rite of passage in which some learning might take place and in which we become acquainted with the shortcomings of our departmental culture.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Speaking about the course in general (i.e., from semester to semester and not in terms of this single iteration), it does not deepen my knowledge of or interest in the discipline. If anything, it is counterproductive, disillusioning me to the state of affairs. Such counterproductivity is caused by obvious faculty disinterest in attendance, in the material, and in engaging in meaningful ways with each other and students. Lack of attention to pedagogical structure and format of the course is an additional cause.In terms of exposing me to useful and interesting source material for future research, however, the course succeeds.
